message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing [product name] and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm offering it to you for $200. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Bob, I appreciate your interest but $120 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $175.  That's still a great deal for this product!
I appreciate your flexibility, but $175 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $150, that's my final offer.
